flawed_nl_solution:
Billy took some candies and got more from his father for a total of 6+8 = <<6+8=14>>14 candies
Caleb has a total of 11+11 = <<11+11=22>>22 candies
Their father gave out 8+11 = <<8+11=17>>17 candies from a pack of 36
He gave the rest which is 36-17 = <<36-17=19>>19 candies to Andy
Andy has a total of 9+19 = <<9+19=28>>28 candies
Andy has 28-22 = <<28-22=6>>6 more candies than Caleb
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
